sentences.en: 673 private golf clubs took part in a recent study.
sentences.cn: 673家私人高尔夫俱乐部参与了最近的研究。

sentences.en: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentences.cn: 他立刻离开，回到汽车旅馆。

sentences.en: His men made a sortie to Guazatan and took a prisoner.
sentences.cn: 他的士兵袭击了瓜扎坦，擒获了一名俘虏。

sentences.en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
sentences.cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

sentences.en: Moreau took gold in the five-kilometre individual pursuit competition.
sentences.cn: 莫罗在个人五公里追逐赛中获得金牌。

sentences.en: She took advantage of him even after they were divorced.
sentences.cn: 甚至在他们离婚后，她还在占他的便宜。

sentences.en: Sir Denis took one look and sent it back.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯爵士看了一眼就把它送了回去。

sentences.en: Soldiers took away four people one of whom was later released.
sentences.cn: 士兵们抓走4个人，其中1个随后被放了回来。

sentences.en: The battle of the sexes also took a new twist.
sentences.cn: 两性之争也出现了新的变数。

sentences.en: The collision took place in the busiest shipping lanes in the world.
sentences.cn: 撞船事故发生在全世界最繁忙的航道上。

sentences.en: The man took her suitcase from her and then searched her.
sentences.cn: 那名男子拿过她手中的提箱，然后对她搜身。

sentences.en: The police stopped her and took her off to a police station.
sentences.cn: 警察拦住她，把她带到了警察局。

sentences.en: The restoration took almost 4,000 man-hours over four years.
sentences.cn: 修复工作历时4年，耗费近4,000工时。

sentences.en: Those people who took up weapons to defend themselves are political prisoners.
sentences.cn: 那些拿起武器自卫的人是些政治犯。

sentences.en: West was wilfully blind to the abuse that took place.
sentences.cn: 韦斯特对发生的虐待行为故意视而不见。

words.tran_cn: 拿；取；接受（take的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 取下；记下（take down的过去式）
拿起；吸纳；接受（take up的过去式）

trans.tran_cn: 拿( take的过去式 )，接受，学习，取得
